blogPost.title:
Tesla's market cap is now $50 billion higher than Walmart.

Sales...
Tesla: $28 billion
Walmart: $549 billion

Net Income...

Walmart: $20 billion

$TSLA $WMT

blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
